name: cially
description: Cially is a self-hosted privacy-focused image board with modern features like real-time posts, custom themes, tagging, and moderation tools. Designed for communities wanting a lightweight and secure alternative to mainstream image boards.
features: Image Board: Privacy-focused community image board. Secure sharing.
Real-Time Posts: Live updates for new content. Instant engagement.
Custom Themes: Personalize appearance with themes. Branded experience.
Tagging System: Organize content with flexible tags. Easy discovery.
Moderation Tools: Comprehensive tools for community management. Safe environment.
Lightweight Alternative: Modern alternative to mainstream boards. Better performance.
Self-Hosted: Complete control over your community. Data sovereignty.
